summary: DOD provides crucial health care services to millions of service members, retirees, and their families. DOD has been working to modernize how it handles patients' electronic health records and has deployed a new electronic records system to its health care facilities. In 2022, DOD began conducting an annual survey of user satisfaction with this new system. User satisfaction rates have improved over the past 2...
title: Electronic Health Records: DOD Has Deployed New System but Challenges Remain
